name: Hopscotch (itch) (Silreth)
description:
Hopscotch, as a puzzle.

The floor is lava, make it across the play room without touching the ground to rack up your score. 

Each time you cross, you'll have less an less space to work with as you choose what tiles to keep and which to lose. 

Plan ahead, set up your board and leap for your life in this simple to learn, hard to master 3D Puzzle Platformer.

Developed by Danny Hill for the GMTK Jam 2022 with the them 'Roll of the Dice'.
